description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Play through 15 levels of classic gameplay or challenge other players locally and over Xbox LIVE. Five different game modes (including the challenging ninja mode) guarantee many hours of pure fun.
description.short: Play through 15 levels of classic gameplay or challenge other players locally and over Xbox LIVE. Five different game modes (including the challenging ninja mode) guarantee many hours of pure fun.
